title: Analysis of Chemistry Learning Communication Patterns: TBLA-Based Mobile Microlearning Design

context.prior_knowledge: Basic understanding of chemical terminology and chemical bonding
context.additional_context: Learners analyze chemistry learning communication patterns using mobile devices in a BYOD environment, receiving real-time feedback via formative assessment

learning_goals: Learners can analyze teacher-student interaction patterns in chemistry classes with 80% accuracy using the TBLA (Teacher Behavior and Language Analysis) methodology.
Learners can visualize key concepts discussed during chemistry learning through Excel-based keyword frequency analysis.
Learners can transcribe voice data collected in mobile environments into text and write reports evaluating classroom communication quality based on this data.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
